unnormalised: Hey, weather's always a gamble, right? Especially for us farmers in Punjab. Remember 20/06/2023's heatwave? Ruined the paddy crop near Amritsar. My uncle, Sharmaji, lost big time. Now he's thinking about drip irrigation, maybe from PAU Ludhiana initiatives. Gotta keep an eye on the monsoon, expected by 15/07/2024. 03:00 PM onwards, fingers crossed! Jai Jawan Jai Kisan! Let's hope for a good yield this time!
